name: Cafe Factory
description:
This game was made for the weekly game jam #159 with the theme of "Cafe". 

The aim of this game is to complete as many orders as possible in the given time. 

For each order you complete, you gain points and extra time, and for each order you don't get, you lose points.

You complete orders by dragging items from the conveyor belts onto the order it's required for. 

An order with no ingredients left on itself is classed as a complete order.

This game was made by myself alone (everything except a few sound effects which i have got from Kenney assets).
